QueryResult.text: SELECT INV.ID , INV.NAME , INV.CODE , INV.DESCRIPTION , INV.IS_ACTIVE , INV.CREATED_DATE , INV.CREATED_BY , INV.LAST_UPDATED_DATE , INV.LAST_UPDATED_BY , PRJ.TYPE , PRJ.STAGE_IDENTIFIER , PRJ.IS_PROGRAM , 'PROJECT' , PRJ.IS_TEMPLATE , INV.PURGE_FLAG , PRJ.IS_REVENUE_PLAN FROM INV_INVESTMENTS INV , INV_PROJECTS PRJ WHERE INV.ID=PRJ.PRID AND PRJ.IS_TEMPLATE = 0
